meanings: (맞서 이겨 내다) match, (어려운 상황 등을) cope with
교통단속 I can't drive because of my suspension.
실용회화-사고 We've had a car accident.

vlive.korean: '입덕사 당했습니다 보험처리되나요?' "I have become a fan. Can it be covered by insurance?" 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 규리의 한강라면🍲 💥매진임박💥
vlive.english: "I have become a fan. Can it be covered by insurance?"

vlive.korean: [몹시 창피] 제가 이래서 개망신을 당했습니다. [Incredibly embarrassed] That's how I totally embarrassed myself. 듣기 View video TRENDY TV(트렌디 티비) : [사다드림 시즌2] 고기 한점이라도 먹은 사람은 불러라, 코끼리쏭!_5회
vlive.english: [Incredibly embarrassed] That's how I totally embarrassed myself.

vlive.korean: 네, 그렇죠 무시 당했습니다. Yes, I just got ignored. 듣기 View video Ben : 애견카페 놀러온 벤♡
이렇게 또 차단 당했습니다. That's how I get nipped in the bud too. 듣기 View video BRANDNEW BOYS : [MXM] 까암짝 라이브 in 마카오
vlive.english: That's how I get nipped in the bud too.

vlive.korean: 저희 회사한테 약간 통수를 당했습니다. I kind of got backstabbed by our company. 듣기 View video Apink : Apink 핑크우주, 스포일러 대작전!
vlive.english: I kind of got backstabbed by our company.

examples.korean: The deputy governor was shot in the back while visiting the scene of an earlier shooting incident. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 부지사는 이에 앞서 발생한 총격 사건 현장을 시찰하던 중 등에 총격을 당했습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
